title: Trump Supports His Helper After Secret Talk with Russia
summary: President Donald Trump is supporting his special helper, Steve Witkoff, after a secret recording was shared. In the recording, Witkoff seemed to be giving advice to a Russian official on how to make President Trump happy. Trump says Witkoff was just doing his job as a dealmaker to help with peace talks between Russia and Ukraine. The peace plan from the US was first seen as too good for Russia, but it has been changed to be fairer. Witkoff has met with Russian President Putin many times but has not visited Ukraine's capital, Kyiv. Ukrainian President Zelensky wants to talk with Trump to solve problems. The secret call was about setting up a phone call between Trump and Putin to discuss ending the war.

background_read: This article is about a political situation involving the United States, Russia, and Ukraine. There is a war between Russia and Ukraine, and the US is trying to help make peace. A special envoy named Steve Witkoff is working on this, and a secret recording was leaked where he talked to a Russian official. Leaks can happen when someone shares private information, and it can cause debates about what is right or wrong in diplomacy. Understanding this helps us learn how countries talk to each other during conflicts.
Article_Structure: WHO: President Donald Trump, special envoy Steve Witkoff, Russian official Yuri Ushakov, and leaders from Ukraine and Russia.
WHAT: A leaked audio recording shows Witkoff advising Ushakov on how to appeal to Trump, and Trump defends Witkoff's actions as normal negotiations.
WHERE: The events involve the United States, Russia, and Ukraine, with talks happening in various locations.
WHY: To discuss a peace plan for the war in Ukraine, with the US trying to mediate, but the leak raises questions about fairness and diplomacy.
